snippet: Nikki Haley, the Republican governor, is narrowing her search to a handful of men and women to fill the seat of Senator Jim DeMint, and Republican officials in the state expect her announcement within the next week.
abstract: Nikki Haley, the Republican governor, is narrowing her search to a handful of men and women to fill the seat of Senator Jim DeMint, and Republican officials in the state expect her announcement within the next week.

byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER and JEFF ZELENY

headline.main: South Carolina Governor Closing In on Replacement for DeMint
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Governor Narrows Senate Seat Search
